model: sig User { follows : set User, sees : set Photo, posts : set Photo, suggested : set User } sig Influencer extends User {} sig Photo { date : one Day } sig Ad extends Photo {} sig Day {}

requirements.description: Every photo is posted by one user
requirements.instances:
run positive1 {
    some disj User1, User2 : User | some disj Photo1, Photo2 : Photo | some disj Day1 : Day {
        User = User1 + User2
        no Influencer
        Photo = Photo1 + Photo2
        no Ad
        Day = Day1
        follows = User1->User2
        sees = User1->Photo1 + User2->Photo2
        posts = User1->Photo1 + User2->Photo2  // Each photo is posted by exactly one user
        suggested = User1->User2
        date = Photo1->Day1 + Photo2->Day1
    }
} for 2 User, 2 Photo, 1 Day expect 1

run positive2 {
    some disj User1 : User | some disj Photo1 : Photo | some disj Day1 : Day {
        User = User1
        Influencer = User1
        Photo = Photo1
        Ad = Photo1
        Day = Day1
        no follows
        sees = User1->Photo1
        posts = User1->Photo1  // The only photo is posted by the only user
        no suggested
        date = Photo1->Day1
    }
} for 1 User, 1 Photo, 1 Day expect 1

run positive3 {
    some disj User1 : User | some disj Day1 : Day {
        User = User1
        no Influencer
        no Photo
        no Ad
        Day = Day1
        no follows
        no sees
        no posts  // No photos exist, so requirement is vacuously true
        no suggested
        no date
    }
} for 1 User, 0 Photo, 1 Day expect 1

run negative1 {
    some disj User1, User2 : User | some disj Photo1 : Photo | some disj Day1 : Day {
        User = User1 + User2
        no Influencer
        Photo = Photo1
        no Ad
        Day = Day1
        no follows
        sees = User1->Photo1 + User2->Photo1
        posts = User1->Photo1 + User2->Photo1  // Photo1 is posted by both users
        no suggested
        date = Photo1->Day1
    }
} for 2 User, 1 Photo, 1 Day expect 0

run negative2 {
    some disj User1 : User | some disj Photo1, Photo2 : Photo | some disj Day1 : Day {
        User = User1
        no Influencer
        Photo = Photo1 + Photo2
        no Ad
        Day = Day1
        no follows
        sees = User1->Photo1
        posts = User1->Photo1  // Photo2 is not posted by any user
        no suggested
        date = Photo1->Day1 + Photo2->Day1
    }
} for 1 User, 2 Photo, 1 Day expect 0

run negative3 {
    some disj User1, User2 : User | some disj Photo1 : Photo | some disj Day1 : Day {
        User = User1 + User2
        Influencer = User1
        Photo = Photo1
        Ad = Photo1
        Day = Day1
        follows = User1->User2
        no sees
        no posts  // Photo1 is not posted by any user
        suggested = User2->User1
        date = Photo1->Day1
    }
} for 2 User, 1 Photo, 1 Day expect 0

run positive1 {
    some disj User1, User2 : User | some disj Photo1 : Photo | some disj Day1 : Day {
        User = User1 + User2
        no Influencer
        Photo = Photo1
        no Ad
        Day = Day1
        follows = User1->User2  // User1 follows User2, no self-following
        sees = User1->Photo1
        posts = User2->Photo1  // Photo1 posted by User2
        no suggested
        date = Photo1->Day1
    }
} for 2 User, 1 Photo, 1 Day expect 1

run positive2 {
    some disj User1 : User | some disj Photo1, Photo2 : Photo | some disj Day1 : Day {
        User = User1
        no Influencer
        Photo = Photo1 + Photo2
        Ad = Photo2
        Day = Day1
        no follows  // No follows relation, so no self-following
        sees = User1->Photo1 + User1->Photo2
        posts = User1->Photo1 + User1->Photo2  // Both photos posted by User1
        no suggested
        date = Photo1->Day1 + Photo2->Day1
    }
} for 1 User, 2 Photo, 1 Day expect 1

run positive3 {
    some disj User1, User2, User3 : User | some disj Photo1 : Photo | some disj Day1, Day2 : Day {
        User = User1 + User2 + User3
        Influencer = User3
        Photo = Photo1
        no Ad
        Day = Day1 + Day2
        follows = User1->User2 + User1->User3 + User2->User3  // No user follows themselves
        no sees
        posts = User3->Photo1  // Photo1 posted by User3
        suggested = User1->User2
        date = Photo1->Day2
    }
} for 3 User, 1 Photo, 2 Day expect 1

run negative1 {
    some disj User1 : User | some disj Photo1 : Photo | some disj Day1 : Day {
        User = User1
        no Influencer
        Photo = Photo1
        no Ad
        Day = Day1
        follows = User1->User1  // User1 follows themselves, violates requirement
        sees = User1->Photo1
        posts = User1->Photo1  // Photo1 posted by User1
        no suggested
        date = Photo1->Day1
    }
} for 1 User, 1 Photo, 1 Day expect 0

run negative2 {
    some disj User1, User2 : User | some disj Photo1, Photo2 : Photo | some disj Day1 : Day {
        User = User1 + User2
        Influencer = User2
        Photo = Photo1 + Photo2
        no Ad
        Day = Day1
        follows = User1->User2 + User2->User2  // User2 follows themselves, violates requirement
        sees = User1->Photo1 + User2->Photo2
        posts = User1->Photo1 + User2->Photo2  // Each photo posted by one user
        suggested = User1->User2
        date = Photo1->Day1 + Photo2->Day1
    }
} for 2 User, 2 Photo, 1 Day expect 0

run negative3 {
    some disj User1, User2, User3 : User | some disj Photo1 : Photo | some disj Day1 : Day {
        User = User1 + User2 + User3
        no Influencer
        Photo = Photo1
        Ad = Photo1
        Day = Day1
        follows = User1->User1 + User2->User3 + User3->User2  // User1 follows themselves, violates requirement
        no sees
        posts = User2->Photo1  // Photo1 posted by User2
        no suggested
        date = Photo1->Day1
    }
} for 3 User, 1 Photo, 1 Day expect 0

requirements.description: Users can see ads posted by everyone, but only see non ads posted by followed users
If a user posts an ad then all its posts should be labeled as ads
requirements.instances:
run positive1 {
    some disj User1, User2 : User | some disj Photo1, Photo2 : Photo | some disj Day1 : Day {
        User = User1 + User2
        no Influencer
        Photo = Photo1 + Photo2
        Ad = Photo1 + Photo2
        Day = Day1
        follows = User1->User2
        sees = User1->Photo1 + User1->Photo2 + User2->Photo1 + User2->Photo2
        posts = User1->Photo1 + User1->Photo2
        no suggested
        date = Photo1->Day1 + Photo2->Day1
    }
} for 2 User, 2 Photo, 1 Day expect 1 // Positive: User1 posts Photo1 and Photo2, both are ads, satisfying the requirement

run positive2 {
    some disj User1 : User | some disj Photo1 : Photo | some disj Day1 : Day {
        User = User1
        no Influencer
        Photo = Photo1
        no Ad
        Day = Day1
        no follows
        no sees
        posts = User1->Photo1
        no suggested
        date = Photo1->Day1
    }
} for 1 User, 1 Photo, 1 Day expect 1 // Positive: User1 posts Photo1 which is not an ad, but User1 doesn't post any ads, so requirement is satisfied

run positive3 {
    some disj User1, User2 : User | some disj Photo1 : Photo | some disj Day1 : Day {
        User = User1 + User2
        Influencer = User2
        Photo = Photo1
        Ad = Photo1
        Day = Day1
        no follows
        sees = User1->Photo1 + User2->Photo1
        posts = User2->Photo1
        no suggested
        date = Photo1->Day1
    }
} for 2 User, 1 Photo, 1 Day expect 1 // Positive: User2 (Influencer) posts Photo1 which is an ad, all posts by User2 are ads

run negative1 {
    some disj User1 : User | some disj Photo1, Photo2 : Photo | some disj Day1 : Day {
        User = User1
        no Influencer
        Photo = Photo1 + Photo2
        Ad = Photo1
        Day = Day1
        no follows
        sees = User1->Photo1
        posts = User1->Photo1 + User1->Photo2
        no suggested
        date = Photo1->Day1 + Photo2->Day1
    }
} for 1 User, 2 Photo, 1 Day expect 0 // Negative: User1 posts Photo1 (ad) and Photo2 (not ad), violating the requirement

run negative2 {
    some disj User1, User2 : User | some disj Photo1, Photo2, Photo3 : Photo | some disj Day1 : Day {
        User = User1 + User2
        no Influencer
        Photo = Photo1 + Photo2 + Photo3
        Ad = Photo2
        Day = Day1
        follows = User2->User1
        sees = User1->Photo2 + User2->Photo1 + User2->Photo2
        posts = User1->Photo1 + User1->Photo2 + User2->Photo3
        no suggested
        date = Photo1->Day1 + Photo2->Day1 + Photo3->Day1
    }
} for 2 User, 3 Photo, 1 Day expect 0 // Negative: User1 posts Photo1 (not ad) and Photo2 (ad), violating the requirement

run negative3 {
    some disj User1, User2 : User | some disj Photo1, Photo2, Photo3 : Photo | some disj Day1, Day2 : Day {
        User = User1 + User2
        Influencer = User1
        Photo = Photo1 + Photo2 + Photo3
        Ad = Photo3
        Day = Day1 + Day2
        follows = User2->User1
        sees = User1->Photo3 + User2->Photo1 + User2->Photo2 + User2->Photo3
        posts = User1->Photo1 + User1->Photo2 + User1->Photo3
        no suggested
        date = Photo1->Day1 + Photo2->Day1 + Photo3->Day2
    }
} for 2 User, 3 Photo, 2 Day expect 0 // Negative: User1 (Influencer) posts Photo3 (ad) but also Photo1 and Photo2 (not ads), violating the requirement

requirements.description: Influencers are followed by everyone else
Suggested are other users followed by followed users, but not yet followed
A user only sees ads from followed or suggested users
